Title: Verify Login with Valid Credentials
Steps: 1. Enter valid email 'test@user.com'. 2. Enter valid password. 3. Click Login.

Title: Verify Login with Invalid Password
Steps: 1. Enter valid email. 2. Enter wrong password. 3. Click Login. 4. Verify error 'Invalid Credentials'.

Title: Verify Account Lockout Logic
Steps: 1. Enter valid email. 2. Enter wrong password 5 times consecutively. 3. Verify 'Account Locked' message.

Title: Verify Password Reset Complexity Success
Steps: 1. Enter new password 'Password$1'. 2. Confirm password. 3. Click Submit.

Title: Verify Password Reset Complexity Failure
Steps: 1. Enter new password 'pass123' (no special char). 2. Click Submit. 3. Verify error regarding complexity rules.

Title: Verify Search by Book Title
Steps: 1. Enter 'The Great Gatsby' in search bar. 2. Click Search icon. 3. Verify book appears in results.

Title: Verify Search by ISBN
Steps: 1. Enter '978-3-16-148410-0'. 2. Click Search. 3. Verify specific edition appears.

Title: Verify Add In-Stock Item to Cart
Steps: 1. Click 'Add to Cart'. 2. Verify Cart counter increments by 1.

Title: Verify Add Out-of-Stock Item Blocked
Steps: 1. Observe 'Add to Cart' button state. 2. Verify button is disabled/grayed out.

Title: Verify Cart Limit Max 10 Items
Steps: 1. Navigate to 11th unique book. 2. Click 'Add to Cart'. 3. Verify error 'Cart limit reached'.

Title: Verify Add Hardcover to Cart
Steps: 1. Select Format 'Hardcover'. 2. Click 'Add to Cart'. 3. Verify Cart displays 'Dune - Hardcover'.

Title: Verify Add Paperback to Cart
Steps: 1. Select Format 'Paperback'. 2. Click 'Add to Cart'. 3. Verify Cart displays 'Dune - Paperback'.

Title: Verify Add Digital Edition to Cart
Steps: 1. Select Format 'ePub'. 2. Click 'Add to Cart'. 3. Verify Cart displays 'Dune - ePub'.

Title: Verify Quantity Update in Cart
Steps: 1. Change quantity dropdown from 1 to 2. 2. Verify Total Price updates accordingly.

Title: Verify Remove Item from Cart
Steps: 1. Click 'Remove' icon next to item. 2. Verify Cart is empty.

Title: Verify Payment with Valid Credit Card
Steps: 1. Enter Valid Card Number. 2. Enter Valid CVV. 3. Click Pay. 4. Verify Success Page.

Title: Verify Payment with Invalid CVV
Steps: 1. Enter Valid Card Number. 2. Enter Invalid CVV. 3. Click Pay. 4. Verify Transaction Declined.

Title: Verify High Value Transaction OTP
Steps: 1. Proceed to Checkout. 2. Click Pay. 3. Verify OTP Modal appears.

Title: Verify Order Cancellation - Processing
Steps: 1. Locate Order. 2. Click 'Cancel Order'. 3. Verify Status changes to 'Cancelled'.

Title: Verify Order Cancellation - Shipped
Steps: 1. Locate Order. 2. Verify 'Cancel Order' button is not visible.
